Title: Requires lithium batteries of less than one inch in diameter and products containing such batteries to be labeled with warnings related thereto
Summary: Requires lithium batteries of less than 1 inch in diameter and products containing such batteries to be labeled with warnings that swallowing such batteries has been known to cause death.
LawCode: Amd ยง490-c, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to requiring warnings on certain lithium batteries and products containing such batteries
